programme.title: Cam & Leon Ep12
programme.desc: Cam and Leon adalah dua ekor sesumpah yang penuh perasaan ingin tahu yang tinggal di taman bandar, jauh dari habitat semula jadi mereka.

programme.title: Lesung Vs Blender Ep04
programme.desc: Lesung Vs Blender merupakan program masakan yang menyajikan masakan moden dan tradisional. Terdapat dua elemen utama yang mewakili masakan tersebut iaitu blender dan lesung batu.

programme.title: Masak Ni Senang! Ep08
programme.desc: Program masakan yang mengetengahkan konsep masakan yang mudah tanpa menggunakan dapur untuk memasak. Menu untuk episod kali ini ialah Nasi Goreng Kimchi, Brownies Alahai and Sup Ketam Super Quick.

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Ep09
programme.desc: Kandungan sketsa kali ini merangkumi gelagat pasangan berfoya di taman. Anak- anak dan menantu merebut wasiat ayah

programme.title: Alamak Ep02

programme.title: Chit Chat Ustaz Ep01

programme.title: Awesome Mart Ep02

programme.title: Pop Yeah Yeah Ep03

programme.desc: Michelle Mei Suet plays Szu-szu, a spoiled girl who leaves her beau Yang Fan, to go off in search of a swordsman whom she idolizes. Whom will she end up with?

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: After Ah Niu moves to Hong Kong, a kind-hearted fellow from rural China is taken advantage by cunning characters including his uncle.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: A detective's son's attempt to punish a swindler leads to him and his father having their own face-off. Starring Jimmy Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Emperor and His Brother
programme.desc: This epic depicts how Chen Chia Lo and his men set out to persuade the Qing Emperor Chien Lung to acknowledge his Han bloodline and join the anti-Qing movement.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: Death and destruction are the order of the day after a bandit's daughter learns some painful truths about her past.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: Sek Kin takes a refreshing break from his usual villain's role, playing a friendly ghost who befriends a young boy and helps him reunite his separated parents.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai's offering follows five fallen angels who suffer love & loss amidst the crime & chaos of Hong Kong's neon nights.

programme.title: Extraordinary Mission
programme.desc: An undercover cop attempts to take down a drug trafficking syndicate from the inside. However, his operation spirals out of control when he becomes an addict while trying to gain the leader's trust.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: This modern-day Cinderella story brings together a man and a woman, who not only come from different worlds but get off on the wrong foot. Will their differences ruin their chance at love?

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Director John Woo gathers Chinese, Japanese & Korean superstars - Zhang Han Yu, Masaharu Fukuyama & Ha Ji Won - in this remake of the classic crime thriller.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: The 1st Asian New Media FF's Best Actress Chrissie Chau reunites with Ekin Cheng in this story of three jilted men, who decide to invest in android girlfriends.

programme.title: 10,000 Miles
programme.desc: In his first movie as a producer, Jay Chou went the distance for his multi-billion ultramarathon film by bringing in a top-notch VFX team from Hollywood.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard suffering from dementia finds a new friend in a little girl named Cherry. When her father's crime connections place her in danger, it is up to him to save her.

programme.title: Let Me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: When a geeky teen librarian stumbles upon the secret terminal illness of his popular classmate, he slowly begins to help her achieve her bucket list. Simultaneously, she draws him out of his shell.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: Scripted and produced by Tsui Hark, this fantasy film depicts a group of warriors protecting the world from a monster invasion. Starring Zhou Dong Yu, Aarif Lee & Ni Ni.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: Perfect Imperfection
programme.desc: Starring Ady An, Ahn Jae Hyun & Alex Fong, this drama depicts the varying perspectives of love that drive two people born under the same horoscope sign - Virgo.

programme.title: Line Walker
programme.desc: Nominated as New Director in 2017 HKFA, Sharmaine Sheh is back with newly joint Nicky Cheung, Louis Koo and Francis Ng in the search for the 6th undercover!

programme.title: Kill Time
programme.desc: Starring Angelababy & Ethan Ruan, Fruit Chan's drama weaves a murder mystery within a bittersweet romance that echoes the love & loss of two generations.

programme.title: Star Runners
programme.desc: Two transport pilots in possession of a mysterious crate are stranded when they crash-land on a dangerous planet full of killer insects.

programme.desc: Alan Hakman's job as a 'cutter' involves removing a deceased's transgressions from a recorded microchip to create a memorial film. But Hakman's life is jeopardized when he uncovers a terrible secret.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance

programme.title: An American Pickle
programme.desc: An immigrant worker falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly, and when he emerges in present day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day.

programme.title: Turbulence
programme.desc: After two prisoners overpower the US Marshals and kill the pilots on board a flight, all hopes rest on an air stewardess who escapes to the cockpit.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: After a teen's premonition of a deadly race-car crash helps saves the lives of his peers, Death sets out to collect those who evaded their end.

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Kick-Ass inspires a new wave of self-made masked crusaders, who become the target of the reborn Red Mist.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: Fired from her job in Rome just before Christmas, Angela is hired as a tour guide by an American executive looking to buy a high-end Italian ceramics company.

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: When detective John Shaw uncovers evidence linking his fellow officers to a murder, they frame him for a homicide he didn't commit.

programme.title: Superman: Man of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Follow the fledgling hero as he engages in bloody battles with intergalactic bounty hunter Lobo and before fighting for his life with the alien Parasite.

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Join Aang, an extraordinary boy with incredible 'bending' powers, as he journeys through an exotic land filled with magical creatures and powerful friends.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A doubting boy finds out first-hand that Santa exists when he goes aboard a magical train headed for the North Pole.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Christian Bale stars as John Connor, the man fated to lead the human resistance against Skynet and its army of Terminators.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the world's smartest, bravest, and highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
programme.desc: When an intergalactic visitor LU-LA crash-lands near Mossy Bottom Farm, Shaun soon sees an opportunity for alien-powered fun and adventure to shepherd LU-LA home.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A single English woman decides to improve her life and chronicle the efforts in a diary.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: An international naval coalition becomes the world's last hope for survival as they engage a hostile alien force in this epic action-adventure.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Based on true events in the Battle of Midway, the film tells story of the leaders and soldiers who used their instincts, fortitude, and bravery to overcome the odds during World War II.

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: a man who has literally been to hell and back, enters this world to help a skeptical policewoman investigate the mysterious suicide of her twin sister in Constantine.

programme.desc: A buyer looks for a vintage home in one of Los Angeles' historic neighborhoods.

programme.title: House Hunters Family S2 Ep11
programme.desc: A family looks for a new home that's move-in ready and has plenty of space in Kansas City, KS.

programme.title: House Hunters Family S2 Ep12
programme.desc: An active family leaves their storm-damaged house for a home that has it all in Papillion, NE.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation S12 Ep06
programme.desc: A Massachusetts couple deals with structural issues and permit problems during their renovation.

programme.title: Build Me up S2 Ep04
programme.desc: A widow with two daughters in Irvine, CA, lost her husband to cancer and lives in a home full of bittersweet memories of his final days.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep518

programme.desc: The son of a high-ranking North Korean official is suspected of committing serial murders around the world. To stop the killer, South Korea, North Korea and Interpol chase after him.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: the Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: The Mayor
programme.desc: Byeon Jong-gu, the incumbent mayor of Seoul, seeks a third term which will set him up for a run at the presidency. He employs all means to keep his darkest secrets hidden from his adoring public.

programme.title: Mothers
programme.desc: A recently widowed woman faces the unexpected challenges of living with her husband's 16-year-old son from a previous marriage.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung who lost confidence to her appearance met her old schoolmate, who has transformed into a beautiful woman through training in the yoga academy.

programme.title: I Am the King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: The Front Line
programme.desc: Near the end of the Korean War, an uneasy ceasefire is ordered, but fighting continues on the front line of the Aerok Hills as soldiers battle to determine a new border between North and South Korea.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: My Mister Ep12
programme.desc: My Mister tells the story of three middle-aged brothers, and a strong, cold woman, who has been living a hard life of her own come together in healing each other's past scars.

programme.title: May Food Bless You Ep25
programme.desc: Veteran comedians and longtime friends Choi Hwa-jung, Lee Young-ja, Song Eun-yi and Kim Sook listen to viewers' concerns and recommend food to heal their souls.
